sequence.speaker: LUCIA
sequence.text: Sister! It’s great to see you feeling better!

sequence.speaker: MARGARET
sequence.text: I'm as well as can be expected.

sequence.speaker: LUCIA
sequence.text: Thank goodness. Oh, right—this is my brother, Adel. Adel, say hello.

sequence.speaker: MARGARET
sequence.text: It’s a great relief that you’re here, Adel. I will be praying for your journey. And for you, since you will be accompanied by Lucia.
